results.title: [Difficult diagnosis in a 17-year-old patient: Type 1 diabetes? Type 2 diabetes? Or "double diabetes"?].
results.text_hl: In the presented @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@, monotherapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was sufficient in the first year.
